entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
